title: Krishak Mitra
applicationJourneyDesc: Track your PM-KISAN application status from start to finish.
applicationChecklistDesc: Follow these steps to complete your application.
readyToStartDesc: Begin your journey to becoming a PM-KISAN beneficiary with our AI assistant.
eKycReminderDesc: e-KYC is mandatory for all PM-KISAN beneficiaries. Complete it online or at a nearby CSC.
aiAssistanceReadyDesc: We've generated helpful tips for your e-KYC process.
requiredDocsDesc: Ensure you have these documents ready for a smooth application process.
saveTimeAiDesc: Click the button below to let our AI assistant fill in your application based on your profile data.
formAutofilledDesc: The AI has filled the form. Please review and edit if necessary.
otpSent: We've sent an OTP to your registered mobile number ending in {last4Digits}. For this demo, please use 123456.
applicationSubmittedDesc: Your form has been submitted and is now pending admin approval.
applicationApprovedDesc: Admin has approved. Finalizing beneficiary status...
applicationRejectedDesc: Application approval has been reset to "Pending".
congratulationsBeneficiary: Congratulations! You are now a Beneficiary.
whatsappApplicationStarted: Hello from Krishak Mitra! Your PM-KISAN application process has started. We will keep you updated.
whatsappApplicationSubmitted: Your PM-KISAN application has been submitted and is now under verification.
whatsappApplicationApproved: Good news! Your PM-KISAN application has been approved. You will soon be added to the beneficiary list.
whatsappFirstInstallment: Congratulations! Your first PM-KISAN installment has been disbursed to your bank account.
